name: Illustris Demo
description:
What is Illustris?

It is currently a Demo made by a solo indie game developer!

This is a 2D Top-Down game taking place in space. Experience fast paced combat, solve physics based puzzles and travel the whole galaxy. 

A foreign civilisation sent their fleet from the other end of this galaxy to exterminate humanity. Pilot the VELOX starfighter, the newest invention of Doctor Dysnomia, to defend planets and to investigate more information about the enemy's supreme leader called "Illustris".

Features:

  • Use your Magnet Beam to distract enemies
  • Collect blueprints to enhance you starfighter
  • Physics based puzzles
  • Gather heart containers to become stronger
